DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion Criteria : - Over age 59 - Gender Age-Matched ( within 3 year ) main protocol participant Exclusion Criteria : - Parkinson 's disease diagnosis - Significant cognitive deficit . - Another neurological orthopedic deficit investigator 's opinion would significant impact gait cognition ( e.g . stroke , fracture ) . This study involve one visit Oregon Health & Science University . The study visit last approximately 2 hour . Measurements : 1 . The participant 's balance assess stand platform complete mental task name alphabet backwards . They ask eye open task close task . For safety , wear harness like use rock climber . 2 . The participant 's ability move balance measure put six sensor body ( wrist , ankle , chest , back ) . Each sensor size weight deck card . To measure movement balance , participant rise chair , walk three foot , turn around , walk back chair , sit . 3 . The participant 's strength evaluate use machine resembles stationary exercise bike . They one leg foot strap onto machine . Participants ask flex extend leg quickly possible five time . This repeated leg .
